aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am someone who loves learning new things and improving myself. I successfully completed the 6-month Train and Work Software Development Bootcamp organized by Architecht. Thanks to this unique camp, I acquired many competencies. Afterwards, I started working full-time as a Software Developer in the Planning-Budget team at LC Waikiki, where I am currently continuing my role. I follow the developments in the competitive and innovative software world and adapt to new trends.

lc_waikiki.title: Software Developer
lc_waikiki.desc_1: Working as a software developer in the Planning and Budgeting team, handling tasks that required analytical solutions.
lc_waikiki.desc_2: Developed RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core, contributing to API integration projects.
lc_waikiki.desc_3: Built user interfaces and web applications using Angular for various internal tools.
lc_waikiki.desc_4: Utilized technologies such as Redis, RabbitMQ, Kibana, AppDynamics, and SSIS to enhance system performance and monitoring.
lc_waikiki.desc_5: Developed and maintained .NET projects, focusing on both backend and frontend components.
lc_waikiki.desc_6: Contributed to artificial intelligence integration projects.
lc_waikiki.desc_7: Worked extensively with MSSQL and T-SQL for database management and query optimization.
lc_waikiki.desc_8: Conducted debugging and troubleshooting in various projects, resolving complex issues and ensuring smooth operations.
lc_waikiki.desc_9: Followed OOP principles and adhered to SOLID design principles to write clean, maintainable, and scalable code.
lc_waikiki.desc_10: Collaborated within Agile methodologies, ensuring adaptability and continuous improvement in project workflows.

architecht.title: Software Developer Trainee
architecht.desc_1: Developing websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
architecht.desc_2: Proficiency in React JS for web project development.
architecht.desc_3: Advanced SQL query writing and troubleshooting complex database issues.
architecht.desc_4: Building Full Stack MVC projects using ASP.NET Core 6.
architecht.desc_5: Developing APIs using ASP.NET Core 6 Web API.
architecht.desc_6: Creating and integrating databases in SQL Server with C# projects using Entity Framework.
architecht.desc_7: Utilizing DevOps tools like Azure DevOps to enhance processes.
architecht.desc_8: Collaborating with teams using TFS tools.
architecht.desc_9: Knowledge of clean architecture and code principles, applying them in projects.
architecht.desc_10: Experience in BOA projects with C# and BOA tools.

pi_works.title: Software Support Intern
pi_works.description: Worked as a software support intern.

flexi.description: Basic English learning app that includes interactive features like level testing, flash cards, multiple choice quizzes, and AI-powered conversations.

cinemaTicketBooking.description: Cinema ticket booking website with movie management, ticket purchasing, filtering capabilities and other functionalities. Developed as a bootcamp graduation project using ASP.NET MVC.

bookstore.description: Full-stack bookstore application demonstrating React, Redux, ASP.NET Core Web API, Entity Framework, SQL Server, JWT authentication, and modern web development practices.

travelblog.description: Full-stack travel blog application built with ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework, SQL Server, featuring user authentication, blog management, city-based content organization, social interactions, and admin panel.

contact.description: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
